articles.title: Completion Ceremony of Taegyedo Tideland
articles.content:
Completion Ceremony of Taegyedo Tideland
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- The reclamation of the Taegyedo Tideland on the northern tip of the west coast of Korea has been successfully completed as a monumental edifice in the era of Songun.
					 As a result, the country's map was changed, an asset to bring about great progress in developing the nation's agriculture and improving the standard of people's living provided and an arable land equivalent to an area of a county has been obtained. 
					
					 A ceremony for the completion of the reclamation project took place on the spot Wednesday.
					
					 Present there were Premier Choe Yong Rim, Secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Kim Ki Nam, Vice-Premier Kim Rak Hui, Chief Secretary of the North Phyongan Provincial Committee of the WPK Kim Phyong Hae, Minister of Agriculture Kim Chang Sik, Minister of State Inspection Kim Ui Sun, and other officials concerned and officials and employees of the North Phyongan Provincial Tideland Reclamation Complex.
					
					 Choe Yong Rim conveyed a congratulatory message of the WPK Central Committee to the builders and helpers who performed shining labor feats in reclaiming the Taegyedo Tideland.
					
					 The message highly praised them for having successfully built another monumental edifice in the era of Songun by displaying the matchless popular heroism and noble self-sacrificing spirit in hearty response to the Party's grand nature-harnessing plan.
					
					It expressed belief that all the builders and their helpers would make greater successes in carrying out their revolutionary tasks, single-mindedly united around General Secretary Kim Jong Il and thus creditably live up to the great trust and expectation of the party.
					
					 Mun Pong Ryong, director of the Tideland Reclamation Guidance Bureau, in a speech on the completion said that President Kim Il Sung opened a bright prospect for reclaiming the tideland in the western coastal areas long ago, formed a powerful reclamation force, clarified the orientation and ways to dynamically push forward the reclamation and wisely led it.
					
					 The speaker noted:
					
					 Visiting the reclamation site of the Taegyedo Tideland on June 13, Juche 97 (2008), Kim Jong Il took the revolutionary measures to push ahead with the tideland reclamation while recollecting with deep emotion the undying feats performed by the President who worked heart and soul to provide the eternal treasure of the country. He again visited the reclamation site in July last year and was satisfied with the fact that the vast gigantic nature-harnessing project was basically completed.
					
					The builders turned out as one with one mind to devotedly implement the plan and intention of 
						Kim Jong Il and launched a decisive and dynamic drive to dam a rough sea.
					
					 The speaker called upon the builders in reclaiming the Taegyedo Tideland to make great leap forward in the tideland reclamation, true to the grand nature-harnessing plan of Kim Jong Il and the militant tasks set forth in the congratulatory message of the WPK Central Committee.
					
					 Then followed speeches.

articles.title: KCNA Releases Report on Completion of Taegyedo Tideland
articles.content:
KCNA Releases Report on Completion of Taegyedo Tideland
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- A detailed report of the Korean Central News Agency on the completion of the Taegyedo Tideland Reclamation Project was released Wednesday.
					 According to it, the project for reclaiming 8 800 hectares of land, the largest ever in the history of tideland reclamation in Korea, was completed to connect Taedasa Islet, Kacha Islet, Soyondong Islet and Taegye Islet in the West Sea with dykes extending several kilometers. This sharply reduced the indentation of the shoreline of Yomju County and Cholsan County of North Phyongan Province.
					
					 As a result, there appeared salterns and fish breeding farms along with a big socialist farm in the nation's leading reclaimed tideland. Thanks to tide embankments seashore farms and villages in various counties are completely freed from the damage by tidal waves and salty seawater and a long ring road linking Tasa Workers' District, Yomju County to Jangsong Workers' District, Cholsan County was built along the strong dykes.
					
					 The project as huge as the West Sea Barrage in terms of size and the volume of work and equivalent to the undertaking to obtain the same arable land as that in a lowland county required the fullest display of mental power as it was Herculean task to create things from nothing, harnessing wild nature at a time when everything was in short supply.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung matured a grandiose plan for reclaiming tideland on the West Coast while waging bloody battles against the Japanese imperialists and formed a group for surveying tideland when the war was at its height, exploring the path for great nature-harnessing projects for the eternal prosperity of the country. General Secretary Kim Jong Il possessed of the iron will to accomplish the patriotic cause for eternal prosperity initiated by the President visited tideland reclamation sites two times when the above-said projects were making dynamic progress. He highly appreciated the successes made by officials and workers there and clearly indicated the way to be followed by them. 
					
					 When the severest tidal waves in hundreds of years hit the whole area along the west coast of Korea on August 21, Juche 86 (1997), the builders there waged a persevering struggle, rebuilding broken sections of Breakwater No.1 between Taedasa Islet and Kacha Islet and Breakwater No. 2 between Kacha Islet and Soyondong Islet and finally relinking Breakwater No. 3 on June 11, Juche 94 (2005) and finishing the first-phase damming up project.
					
					 By July Juche 96 (2007) the builders successfully completed Breakwaters Nos. 2 and 4 and completed Breakwater No.1 on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the DPRK.
					
					 They built Breakwater No. 3 covering hundreds of thousands of square meters with feldspar through their patriotic devoted drive.
					
					 Thanks to the patriotic enthusiasm and heroic struggle of the builders, such inner network project as installation of draining gates and building of embankment in the middle and lower reaches of a river were simultaneously carried out, turning thousands of hectares of tideland into a fertile land. 
					
					 The Taegyedo Tideland Reclamation Project was finally completed with the completion of Breakwater No. 3 ahead of schedule.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim Congratulates Finnish PM
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim Congratulates Finnish PM
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim Wednesday sent a congratulatory message to Mari Kiviniemi upon her appointment as prime minister of Finland.
					 The message wished the prime minister success in her work for the country's prosperity and the people's welfare.

articles.title: Rev. Han Sang Ryol Meets Farmers
articles.content:
Rev. Han Sang Ryol Meets Farmers
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- Rev. Han Sang Ryol of south Korea met with agricultural workers of the Migok Co-op Farm in Sariwon City of North Hwanghae Province on Wednesday.
					 Agricultural workers in their speeches warmly welcomed with warm compatriotic feelings the reverend who visited Pyongyang at the risk of his life.
					
					 The south Korean puppet authorities threaten that they would take legal action against him, while taking issue with his righteous Pyongyang visit but it is the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors who deserves punishment, they noted, declaring that they would keep and glorify the June 15 joint declaration by joining efforts with the south Korean farmers.
					
					 The reverend said that the farmers in the south and the north should frustrate the interference of foreign forces with united efforts and sow seeds of reunification and peace on the territory of Korea and take good care of them.
					
					 At his earlier meeting with the workers of the Pyongyang 326 Electric Wire Factory, Rev. Han Sang Ryol referred to the fact that the workers in the south and the north have waged the patriotic movement for reunification in unity after the publication of the historic June 15 joint declaration, stressing the need for them to take the lead in preserving the June 15 joint declaration and create a new history of reunification.
					
					 Working people of the factory expressed the firm will to wage unflinching struggle for independent reunification, peace and prosperity, firmly joining hands with the workers in south Korea under the banner of "By our nation itself".
					
					 The reverend also met with former unconverted long-term prisoners who are pro-reunification patriotic fighters.

articles.title: Iranian Embassies Help Korean Farmers
articles.content:
Iranian Embassies Help Korean Farmers
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- Morteza Moradian, Iranian ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy did a friendly work on the DPRK-Iran Friendship Ripsok Cooperative Farm in Mundok County, South Phyongan Province on Wednesday.
					They went round the dwelling house visited by General Secretary Kim Jong Il. Then they helped farmers in weeding a maize field.
					
					 After going round a nursery and kindergarten of the farm, they appreciated an art performance given by children.
					
					 They handed aid materials to the farm.

articles.title: Army-People Rallies Held in Provinces
articles.content:
Army-People Rallies Held in Provinces
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- Army-people rallies against the United States were held between June 28 and 30 in Kangwon and North and South Hamgyong provinces and Nampho City on the occasion of "June 25, the day of struggle against the U.S. imperialists".
					 Present there were leading officials of local party and power bodies and working people's organizations, servicepersons, people from all walks of life and youth and students.
					
					 Speakers at the rallies bitterly condemned the U.S. imperialists for using germ and chemical weapons at random and attempting to drop A-bombs in wanton violation of international law during the Korean War.
					
					 The warmongers should clearly know that the provocation of the Korean War on June 25, 1950 was followed by the Korean people's victory on July 27, 1953, they stated, solemnly warning that the army and people of the DPRK will give vent to their pent-up grudge and resentment and mercilessly wipe the U.S. imperialists out should they recklessly come in attack on it.
					
					They called for bringing about great innovations and leap forward in production and construction with the unshakable faith that the Korean people are sure to win under the leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The rallies were followed by anti-U.S. demonstrations. 
					
					 Similar rallies took place in cities and counties such as Sunchon City, South Phyongan Province and Paekam County, Ryanggang Province.

articles.title: Inter-provincial Sports Contest Closes
articles.content:
Inter-provincial Sports Contest Closes
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- The inter-provincial sports contest which opened on June 15 closed with due ceremony at the Haeju Stadium on Wednesday.
					 At the contest which brought together excellent male and female players selected from various provinces, players from South Hwanghae Province won in football(female), basketball(male), judo(male and female) and marathon(male), thus placing first in the team standing.
					
					 Players from South Hamgyong Province came second while those from North Phyongan Province third.

articles.title: Coal Production Goes Up
articles.content:
Coal Production Goes Up
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- The coal output is on the increase in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The workers of the Anju Area Coal Mining Complex, deeply aware that boosting the coal output is very important for the country's economic growth, have raised capital tunneling more than 2.7 times, preparatory tunneling some 1.8 times and coal production over 2.7 times in the first half of the year, compared with the same period of the previous year.
					
					 As of June 21, the complex topped its target for the first half of the year at 102 percent.
					
					 Sinri, Yonphung, Chilli and other coal mines under the complex have introduced rational hewing methods suited to their coal beds and operated the tunneling and hewing equipment at full capacity to steadily increase the production. 
					
					 The Kaechon Area Coal Mining Complex has brought about a big result in tunneling and hewing by solving hundreds of scientific and technical issues.
					
					 Coal mines under the Sunchon Area Coal Mining Complex have also boosted the production.
					
					 The Sinchang Youth Coal Mine has surpassed their May and June assignments.
					
					 From the beginning of the year the Ryongdae Coal Mine has reserved scores of cutting faces with large deposits to provide solid foundations for increased production.
					
					 The Hakpho Coal Mine in North Hamgyong Province has overfulfilled its daily quotas at more than 120 percent.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Greeting WPK Conference
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Greeting WPK Conference
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- The conference of the Workers' Party of Korea to be convened this significant year, the 65th anniversary of the founding of the WPK, will mark a historic occasion of powerfully demonstrating the Juche-oriented and revolutionary character and tremendous militant might of the WPK founded by President Kim Il Sung and led by General Secretary Kim Jong Il, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an editorial. It calls upon all the people to greet the conference of the WPK with high political enthusiasm and shining labor achievements by accelerating a dynamic advance for effecting a great surge.
					 The WPK has led the revolution to one victory after another in all annals of the sacred revolution for 65 years, thus building a socialist power, independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence, on this land and ushering in a new era of prosperity, the editorial notes, and goes on:
					
					 Three decades since the 6th Congress of the WPK are a shining course in which a landmark turn took place in developing the WPK and a great victory and achievements were gained in all fields of the revolution and construction under the dynamic leadership of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Thanks to his wise leadership the WPK has demonstrated its might as an invincible revolutionary party based on the single-minded unity whose members are transparent in the idea and incomparably strong in their faith and will and as an iron-willed party working astonishing miracles in all fields of the revolution and construction and winning one victory after another amid the absolute support of the popular masses.
					
					 The army and the people of the DPRK keenly realize that the party's determination precisely means practice and victory, experiencing the exciting era of a great surge in which world startling events are taking place one after another this year just as they did last year.
					
					 The editorial calls on all fields and units to conduct a dynamic general offensive full of conviction of sure victory and optimism under the uplifted revolutionary slogan "When the Party Is Determined, We Can Do Anything!" and thus hit their high targets  for this year set on the occasion of the 65th founding anniversary of the WPK earlier than scheduled.

articles.title: 80th Anniversary of Kalun Meeting Observed
articles.content:
80th Anniversary of Kalun Meeting Observed
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Wednesday dedicates a signed article to the 80th anniversary of the Kalun meeting at which President Kim Il Sung clarified the truth of Juche.
					 Kim Il Sung made public work "The Path of the Korean Revolution" at the meeting of leading officials of the Young Communist League and the Anti-imperialist Youth League in Kalun, declaring to the world the founding of the Juche idea.
					
					 The article says:
					
					 The Juche idea serves as a banner for protecting a nation as it makes it possible to decisively frustrate the moves of the imperialists for domination and firmly defend the sovereignty of the country and the nation. It also serves as a banner of national prosperity as it makes it possible to achieve the independent development and prosperity of the country and the nation by its own efforts.
					
					 The Korean revolution has advanced along the path indicated by the Juche-oriented line laid down by Kim Il Sung at the meeting, thus enabling it to win one victory after another despite the stern tempests of history. As a result, the Korean people have become a heroic people who explored an un-trodden path of achieving sovereignty, independence and socialism and the DPRK has emerged a country shedding its rays all over the world as a country strong in the spirit of independence and a homeland of the great idea steering the era. 
					
					 The tremendous might of the Juche idea finds its vivid manifestation in the fact that all the people have consolidated their firm unity around the party and the leader in every way, building a powerful driving force for the revolution and winning a great victory and performing miracles in carrying out the socialist cause of Juche and building a rich and powerful country.
					
					 All the people are making a history of great revolutionary surge in hearty response to the plan of the party for building a thriving nation. This is a powerful demonstration of the might of the single-minded unity of the people around the headquarters of the revolution. The DPRK is the great socialist country based on the single-minded unity as all its servicepersons and people have achieved the unity in thinking and work style and dynamic advances toward a thriving nation while frustrating the imperialists' moves against the DPRK.
					
					 The work in all fields including party and state building and economic and cultural construction in the DPRK is now being carried out as required by the Juche idea and the Songun idea based on it under any circumstances. The requirements of Juche are fully met and the principle of Songun is thoroughly implemented in all aspects ranging from the state administration and economic management to the people's politico-ideological and cultural life and the day of victory in the drive for building a thriving nation is drawing near thanks to the exceptionally high revolutionary spirit and creative enthusiasm of the popular masses. This is the shining reality of the DPRK, concludes the article.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans Condemn US as Provokers of War
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans Condemn US as Provokers of War
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- A meeting of the General Association of Koreans in China was held in Shenyang on June 25 to denounce the crimes of the U.S. imperialists.
					 Present at the meeting were Choe Un Bok, chairperson of the association, and other officials and Korean residents in Shenyang.
					
					 The meeting heard a statement issued by the History Society of the DPRK "The U.S. should immediately dismantle the illegal 'UN Forces Command' and opt for signing a peace treaty" and a joint statement of the Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea, the National Peace Committee of Korea and the North Headquarters of the Nationwide Special Committee for Probing the Truth behind the GIs' Crimes. 
					
					 Choe Un Bok in a speech said that 60 years ago the U.S. imperialists carried out the most barbaric war of aggression in the world history of wars to stifle the DPRK in its cradle and realize its wild ambition for world domination.
					
					 Choe declared that all the officials of the association and compatriots together with world peace-loving people would disclose before the whole world the atrocities committed by the U.S. aggressor troops in the Korean War and turn out as one in the struggle to thoroughly frustrate the ambition of the U.S. imperialists for invading the DPRK.
					
					 At the end of the meeting the participants watched a Korean film on the brutal murder committed by the U.S. imperialists in Sinchon during the Korean War.
					
					 On the same day the United Confederation of Koreans in Kamchatka Region, Russia, in a statement on the lapse of 60 years since the U.S. imperialists ignited the war of aggression in Korea strongly demanded the U.S. and the south Korean authorities stop at once the reckless moves to ignite the second Korean war.
					
					 Cha Sang Bo, vice-chairman of the General Association of Koreans in China, in a statement on June 26 lashed out at the U.S. for imposing immeasurable misfortune and sufferings upon the Korean nation by provoking the war of aggression and bringing the dark clouds of a nuclear war to hang over it at present.

articles.title: Japanese Citizens Demand Assistance to Korean Schools
articles.content:
Japanese Citizens Demand Assistance to Korean Schools
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- Japanese citizens' actions demanding the settlement of the issue of assisting the Korean schools were launched in Tokyo on June 27.
					 They were participated in by representatives and members of more than 140 organizations including associations for assisting Korean schools in different parts of Japan, the Tokyo Assemblymen's Liaison Society for the Promotion of Japan-Korea Friendship and the Saitama Prefectural Council for Japan-Korea Friendship and Solidarity and other solidarity organizations and Japanese organizations related to the movement for human rights and peace and other Japanese citizens.
					
					 Among the participants were teachers and students of Tokyo and Kanagawa Korean senior high schools, members of the society of mothers and other Koreans in Japan. 
					
					 Speakers at a meeting denounced the Japanese authorities for their unjust action of excluding only Korean schools from the tuition-free program for senior high schools.
					
					 The claim that the educational contents at the Korean schools run counter to the Japanese law is nonsense and this is a politically motivated national discrimination, they held.
					
					 They called for waging signature campaigns, distribution of leaflets and demos across Japan with broad strata of Japanese citizens involved to find a sure solution to the issue of assisting Korean schools. 
					
					 A resolution adopted at the meeting noted that the discrimination against the Korean schools is a human rights abuse by the Japanese authorities, strongly demanding the authorities give the same assistance to the Korean schools as done to the Japanese schools.
					
					 At the end of the meeting the participants staged a demonstration, shouting "Tuition-free program for all the senior high school students!" "Children are equal!" "No chauvinism!" etc.

articles.title: Letter to WPK from WPB
articles.content:
Letter to WPK from WPB
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea received a letter from the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Belgium on June 25, 60 years after the outbreak of the Korean War.
					 The letter fully supported all efforts made by the WPK and the DPRK government for peace on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The WPB joins the peace-loving people of Asia and the rest of the world in demanding the U.S. withdraw its forces and military bases from south Korea and other countries, the letter said.
					
					 It urged the U.S. to implement all agreements made with the DPRK to the letter, roll back its policy for stifling it and conclude a peace treaty with the DPRK.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at WPK Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at WPK Observed
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- A friendly meeting took place in China, lectures and film shows in South Africa and Uganda, film shows in Russia and Malaysia and a ceremony of opening a Korean book and photo exhibition week was held by the Secretariat of the Pan-African Movement between June 12 and 16 on the occasion of the 46th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Displayed in the venue of the exhibition were books and photos on exploits of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Participants of the film shows watched such Korean films as "Reply of Korea" and "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation".
					
					 The chairman of the Group for the Study of the Progressive Ideas of South Africa spoke highly of the exploits performed by Kim Jong Il for party building, saying that the 19th of June is a historic day which made it possible to further develop the WPK into the party of the President.
					
					 He noted that Kim Jong Il has enjoyed absolute support and trust from all the Korean people as he has always boundlessly loved them, leading them to victory.
					
					 The chairman of the Kampala City Committee of the Uganda National Resistance Movement in a lecture lauded Kim Jong Il as a prominent leader who achieved the single-minded unity of the leader, the party and the popular masses, the unity which can hardly be found in any other country of the world.

articles.title: Korean People's Struggle Backed by British Organizations
articles.content:
Korean People's Struggle Backed by British Organizations
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on June 24 on the occasion of the month of international solidarity with the Korean people.
					 The statement said that the Fatherland Liberation War was a war of justice fought by the Korean people to beat back the Yankee aggressors and protect the freedom, liberation and sovereignty of the country, adding the victory won by them in the war was the victory of the Songun idea.
					
					 The statement denounced the cruel and bestial atrocities perpetrated by the U.S. imperialists during the war.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists are running wild to ignite another war in Korea by patronizing and prodding the Lee Myung Bak puppet clique, the statement pointed out, expressing support to the Korean people's struggle to force the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces to pull out of south Korea immediately and unconditionally and demanding that the "UN Forces Command" in south Korea be disbanded.

articles.title: Story of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Story of Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- One day in March Juche 82 (1993), President Kim Il Sung had a consultative meeting with officials of the agricultural sector.
					 At the meeting the Management Board chairman of a cooperative farm spoke of the experience gained by the farm in rice-transplantation.
					
					 After listening to the chairman's speech carefully, the President expressed satisfaction over the farm's fine experience and said he learned a good thing at the meeting.
					
					 He then told the participants in the meeting that peasants were teachers in farming and that he, not being a peasant, knew well about farming because he had learned from them.
					
					 He had often met peasants on fields to discuss the farm work and teach them farming methods he personally found out on experimental fields in his residence. But he called them teachers in farming.
					
					 The participants in the meeting were deeply impressed by his modest attitude.

articles.title: Terminada la roturacion de marisma de la isla Taegye
articles.content:
Terminada la roturacion de marisma de la isla Taegye
Pyongyang, 30 de junio (ATCC) -- La Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea hizo publica el dia 30 la informacion detallada sobre el termino de la roturacion de la marisma de la isla Taegye.
					Esta obra, que permitio obtener 8 mil 800 hectareas de marisma, resulto la mas grande en la historia de roturacion de marismas en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, comienza la informacion y prosigue:
					
					Como resultado, han sido entrelazados por el dique de decenas de ries (10 ries equivalen a 4 kilometros) las islas dispersadas en el Mar Oeste de Corea como la Taedasa, la Kacha, la Soyondong y la Taegye y se han reducido considerablemente las costas curvilineas de los distritos de Yomju y Cholsan de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte. 
					
					En ese lugar aparecieron una gran granja cooperativa socialista, las salinas y criaderos de peces. 
					
					Gracias al malecon recien construido, las granjas y aldeas litorales de varios distritos no sufriran nunca los danos por las marejadas y la salinidad. Ademas, a lo largo del dique que se pierde en el horizonte, se construyo una gran carretera de circunvalacion que une las comunidades obreras de Tasa del distrito de Yomju y de Jangsong del distrito de Cholsan. 
					
					La roturacion de la marisma de la isla Taegye, que en su dimension equivalio a la obra del Complejo Hidraulico del Mar Oeste, posibilito obtener el terreno cultivable correspondiente a un distrito de la zona llana. Ha sido una batalla librada con la potencia espiritual nunca vista en este mundo para crear riquezas desde el cero aun en el periodo muy dificil domando la naturaleza salvaje.
					
					Ya durante la ensangrentada lucha armada antijaponesa, el Presidente Kim Il Sung habia trazado el grandioso proyecto de roturar las marismas en la costa del Mar Oeste de Corea.
					
					En plenos dias de la enconada Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, hizo formar un grupo de investigadores de marismas dando asi el primer paso de la transformacion de la naturaleza para la prosperidad eterna de la patria. 
					
					Cuando la obra estaba en su plenitud, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il visito en dos ocasiones el lugar de construccion con la ferrea voluntad de cumplir satisfactoriamente la causa patriotica iniciada por el Presidente. En esas ocasiones, el Dirigente evaluo de altos los exitos de lucha de los funcionarios y los obreros e ilumino claramente el camino a seguir por ellos. 
					
					 Cuando el rompeolas fue destruido seriamente por el maremoto mas grande de varios siglos que azoto el 21 de agosto del 86 (1997) de la Era Juche toda la zona costera del Mar Oeste de Corea, los constructores reconstruyeron trabajando duro el dique no. 1 entre las islas Taedasa y Kacha y el no. 2 entre las islas Kacha y Soyondong. El 11 de junio del 94 (2005) de la Era Juche, lograron por fin empalmar de nuevo el dique no. 3 y terminaron la obra de contencion del mar de la primera etapa.
					
					Hasta julio del 96 (2007) de la Era Juche, ellos completaron con exito la construccion de los diques no. 2 y 4 y lo hicieron con el dique no. 1 en visperas del 60o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea (el 9 de septiembre de 2008).
					
					 Gracias a su lucha abnegada, heroica y patriotica, quedo levantado un solido terraplen de piedra en la vasta area de cientos de miles de metros cuadrados del dique no. 3.
					
					 Al mismo tiempo, se llevo a cabo la obra interna como la instalacion de compuertas y la construccion de diques intermedio y bajo, de modo que miles de hectareas de marisma se convirtieran en arrozales fertiles.
					
					 La roturacion de la marisma de la isla Taegye termino por fin al acabarse con adelanto la obra del dique no. 3.

articles.title: Pastor surcoreano Han Sang Ryol se reune con trabajadores
articles.content:
Pastor surcoreano Han Sang Ryol se reune con trabajadores
Pyongyang, 30 de junio (ATCC) -- El pastor surcoreano Han Sang Ryol se encontro el dia 30 con los trabajadores agricolas de la Granja Cooperativa de Migok de la ciudad de Sariwon de la provincia de Hwanghae del Norte.
					 En la ocasion varios trabajadores agricolas hicieron uso de la palabra dando calurosa bienvenida con ardiente sentimiento fraternal al pastor Han quien visito Pyongyang a pesar del riesgo.
					
					Ahora las autoridades titeres surcoreanas cuestionan la justa visita a Pyongyang del pastor Han diciendo que lo someteran segun la "ley", pero, los que deben ser sometidos al juicio son la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak, insistieron los oradores y destacaron que defenderan y haran brillar la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio uniendo las fuerzas con los campesinos surcoreanos.
					
					  El pastor Han dijo que con las fuerzas unidas, los campesinos del Sur y el Norte deben rechazar la intervencion de las fuerzas foraneas y sembrar las semillas de la reunificacion y la paz sobre el suelo patrio y cultivarlas.
					
					  En el encuentro con la clase obrera de la Fabrica de Cables Electricos 326 de Pyongyang efectuado con anterioridad, Han se refirio a que despues de la publicacion de la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, los obreros de ambas partes han desarrollado el movimiento patriotico por la reunificacion uniendo las fuerzas y subrayo que los obreros intercoreanos tienen que ponerse en el futuro tambien a la cabeza para cumplir susodicha declaracion y crear nueva historia de la reunificacion.
					
					  Los trabajadores de esa empresa expresaron la firme voluntad de luchar tenazmente por la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad junto con los obreros surcoreanos bajo la bandera de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales".
					
					  Por otra parte, Han Sang Ryol se entrevisto con los ex presos de largas condenas no abjurados, combatientes patrioticos de la reunificacion.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun exhorta a acoger con exito la conferencia del PTC
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun exhorta a acoger con exito la conferencia del PTC
Pyongyang, 30 de junio (ATCC) -- En su editorial difundido este miercoles, el diario Rodong Sinmun senala que la conferencia del Partido del Trabajo de Corea a sesionar en este ano significado del 65o aniversario de la fundacion del PTC marcara un hito historico para poner de pleno manifiesto el caracter jucheano y revolucionario y la inagotable potencia combativa de esta organizacion fundada por el Presidente Kim Il Sung y guiada por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					Todos deben acoger con elevado entusiasmo politico y relevantes exitos de trabajo la conferencia del PTC acelerando con mas dinamismo la marcha general en gran auge de hoy, senala el editorial y continua:
					
					Durante 65 anos desde su fundacion, el PTC construyo sobre la tierra patria una potencia socialista independiente, autarquica y de autodefensa orientando siempre a la victoria la revolucion coreana en todas las sagradas decadas de este proceso revolucionario y abrio de esta manera la nueva era de prosperidad.
					
					Los 30 anos desde la celebracion del 6o congreso del PTC hasta hoy fueron la trayectoria orgullosa en que bajo la energica guia del Dirigente, se ha registrado el cambio radical en el desarrollo del PTC y logrado grandes victorias y exitos en todos dominios de la revolucion y la construccion.
					
					Gracias a la sabia direccion de el, el PTC se ha convertido en el partido invencible, revolucionario, unido monoliticamente y mas fuerte en la idea, la fe y la voluntad.
					
					Igualmente, ha crecido como la organizacion de acero que sale siempre victoriosa creando con el apoyo absoluto de las masas populares sorprendentes milagros en todas las ramas de la revolucion y la construccion.
					
					Viviendo la epoca de gran auge en que se registran incesantemente los eventos de sorpresa para todo el mundo tanto en este ano como en el pasado, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea sienten en carne propia que la decision del PTC es precisamente la realidad y victoria.
					
					Todos los sectores y unidades deben cumplir con anticipacion las metas propuestas este ano con motivo del 65o aniversario de la fundacion del PTC desplegando la ofensiva general con la fe y optimismo de la victoria bajo la consigna revolucionaria de "!Si el Partido decide, lo cumplimos!"

articles.title: Idea Juche es eterna bandera de nuestra epoca, afirma Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Idea Juche es eterna bandera de nuestra epoca, afirma Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 30 de junio (ATCC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun inserto en su edicion de este miercoles un articulo individual dedicado al 80o aniversario de la conferencia de Kalun organizada y dirigida por el Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					Hace ahora 80 anos,  el 30 de junio del 19 (1930) de la Era Juche, el Presidente convoco en Kalun la conferencia de los cuadros de la Juventud Comunista y de la Union de la Juventud Antiimperialista, recuerda el articulo y continua:
					
					En esa ocasion el Presidente publico la obra maestra "El camino a seguir por la revolucion coreana", en la cual proclamo a todo el mundo la creacion de la idea Juche.
					
					Esta idea sirve de la bandera de defensa nacional y de prosperidad nacional, que posibilita frustrar tajantemente las maniobras dominacionistas de los imperialistas, defender con firmeza la soberania de la nacion y lograr con las fuerzas propias de la nacion el desarrollo independiente y la prosperidad del pais y la nacion. 
					
					Al mantener las lineas autoctonas presentadas por el Presidente en la conferencia de Kalun, la revolucion coreana pudo lograr siempre victorias superando todas las vicisitudes de la historia, el pueblo coreano se hizo el heroico que allano el camino inexplorado por la independencia, la soberania y el socialismo, y la RPDC se convirtio en el pais con fuerte espiritu independiente y en la patria de la gran idea de la epoca. 
					
					El poderio inagotable de la idea Juche reside en que preparo el poderoso sujeto de la revolucion mediante el fortalecimiento del poderio de la unidad de todo el pueblo en torno al partido y al lider y creo grandes victorias y milagros en el cumplimiento de la causa socialista del Juche y en la construccion de la patria prospera. 
					
					Hoy dia, todo el pueblo coreano, levantado unanimemente en pleno acato al proposito del partido de construir una gran potencia prospera, crea una historia del gran auge revolucionario. Esto manifiesta plenamente el poderio de la unidad monolitica en torno a la Direccion de la Revolucion. 
					
					Nuestra patria es el gran pais socialista de unidad monolitica en que el ejercito y el pueblo logran la unidad de la idea y la del temperamento de lucha y avanzan con vigor hacia la gran potencia prospera frustrando las maniobras anti-RPDC de los imperialistas. 
					
					Hoy dia, en nuestro pais se realizan todas las labores incluso la construccion del partido, la del Estado, la economica y la cultural, de acuerdo con la demanda de la idea Juche y la del Songun que echa sus raices en la primera. 
					
					En nuestra patria estan materializados cabalmente la demanda del Juche y los principios del Songun en todas las esferas de la sociedad, desde la administracion del Estado y la de economia hasta las vidas sociopoliticas y culturales y se adelanta el dia del triunfo de la gran potencia prospera por el extraordinario espiritu revolucionario y el entusiasmo creativo de las masas populares.
